articles.author: Eric Sylvers, Andrew Jeong
articles.title: Italy, South Korea Work to Contain Coronavirus Outbreaks - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Italy, South Korea Work to Contain Coronavirus Outbreaks The Wall Street Journal Coronavirus Live Updates: South Korean Cases Spike, and Fear Builds The New York Times Coronavirus cases double in one day in South Korea BBC News Fears over containing novel cor…
articles.content:
South Korea reported a surge in coronavirus cases centered on a church where a thousand people have been exposed to the disease, as Italy worked to contain an outbreak in two clusters that by late Saturday had left about 50 people infected and two dead.
